title: FoodNav
description: Need food assistance? Our AI-powered assistant helps you find nearby food resources based on your location, needs, and availability. Access it via web, mobile, SMS, or voice. It's quick, private, and easy to use.

contact.title: Get in touch!
contact.description: Our AI assistant helps you find food resources easily on any device, with voice, text, and visual options for everyone.
contact.feedback_form: Fill our feedback form if you have recently used our service. We would love to hear from you!
